title: Destiny 2 Emblem Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free SteelSeries Destiny 2 Emblem Key and dive into the world of Destiny 2!
instructions:
1. Login into your free Steelseries account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: Genshin Impact Free Primogems Code (Updated!)
description:
Claim your free code for Genshin Impact and receive Primogems at no cost! Each code unlocks 50 Primogems plus more! Please note that you need to be at least Rank 10 to use these codes. Redeem your code now before expires!

New Codes:
GA9FPD42SJ4V - (60 Primogems + 5 Adventurer's Experience)
GS6ACJ775KNV - (60 Primogems & 10,000 Mora)
GENSHINGIFT - (50 Primogems)
instructions:
1. Click the "Get loot button" and create your Genshin Impact account.
2. Start the game and reach adventure Rank 10 before using these codes.
3. Then go to the Genshin Impact website and click the "Redeem Code" at the top menu and insert your code.

*Please note this codes will expire soon, and will only work on the PC and mobile versions.

title: Brawlhalla: Hraesvelgr's Eyes Blasters Weapon Skin Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Hraesvelgr's Eyes Blasters Weapon Skin Key for Brawlhalla!
instructions:
1. Complete all steps to unlock your key
2. To redeem your key, go to the in-game store
3. Then type your code into "Redeem Code" at the bottom
platforms: PC, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS

title: Genshin Impact 30 Primogems (v3.2) Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Genshin Impact 30 Primogems Key! Please note the 30 Primogems key can only be redeemed once per account on v3.2 (with Adventure Rank 10 and higher).
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware Arena account and click the button to unlock your code.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your code.

title: Dead by Daylight Codes
description: Are you looking for Dead by Daylight Codes? Today is your lucky day, grab lots Dead by Daylight Codes and unlock Bloodpoints, Shards, Rift Fragments, Charms and more. We are constantly updating those codes so check them out.
instructions:

2. Redeem all the codes instantly! It's that easy!
platforms: PC, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch

instructions:

title: Free Rocket League Codes
description:
Rocket League is giving away free in-game items, to unlock those items you just need to use the codes below. Please note the base game is required to play this DLC content.

Active Codes:
popcorn

This codes will expire soon so redeem the code now!
instructions:
1. Launch Rocket League (Via Steam, XB1 or PS4)
2. Go to "Extras"; in the Main Menu and select "Redeem Code" then enter the code: popcorn.

title: Destiny 2: Free Emblem Codes
description:
Score free in-game Emblems for Destiny 2! You just need to redeem the codes bellow. Best of all, it's free! If anyone knows other Emblem codes, please feel free to share them! Please note that emblem codes probably have an expiration date, and will not work once expired

    X9FGMAH6D
    XFV-KHP-N97
    A7LFYC44X
    JDT-NLC-JKM
    N3LXN6PXF
    7CP-94V-LFP
    FJ9-LAM-67F
    7F9-767-F74
    X4C-FGX-MX3
    JD7-4CM-HJG
    JNX-DMH-XLA
    3VF-LGC-RLX
instructions:
1. Redeem your Emblem code at https://www.bungie.net/en/User/coderedemption
2. That's it! Have fun!
